text: Denzil Llewellyn Douglas (born 14 January 1953) is a Saint Kitts and Nevis politician. He is the longest serving Prime Minister. He was in office from 1995 to 2015. He is the leader of the Saint Kitts and Nevis Labour Party (SKNLP). ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Saint Kitts and Nevis
title: Denzil Douglas
